Methods

doFilter()

doFilter(string  $text, string|array  $filters) : string

Call each filter.

Parameters

string $text

the text to filter.
string|array $filters

as comma separated list of filter, or filters sent in as array.

Returns

string —

the formatted text.

Deprecated

deprecated since version 1.2 in favour of parse().

Tags

None found

getFilters()

getFilters() : array

Return an array of all filters supported.

Returns

array —

with strings of filters supported.

Tags

hasFilter()

hasFilter(string  $filter) : boolean

Check if filter is supported.

Parameters

string $filter

to use.

Throws

\Mos\TextFilter\mos/TextFilter/Exception

when filter does not exists.

Returns

boolean —

true if filter exists, false othwerwise.

Tags

None found

parse()

parse(string  $text, array  $filter) : array

Call each filter and return array with details of the formatted content.

Parameters

string $text

the text to filter.
array $filter

array of filters to use.

Throws

\Mos\TextFilter\mos/TextFilter/Exception

when filterd does not exists.

Returns

array —

with the formatted text and additional details.

None found

shortCodeFigure()

shortCodeFigure(string  $options) : array

Shortcode for <figure>.

Usage example: [FIGURE src="img/home/me.jpg" caption="Me" alt="Bild på mig" nolink="nolink"]

for the shortcode.
